history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 2024, QuebeCar was born from a passion for automobiles and a desire to revolutionize the car market in Quebec. We started as a small local dealership and have grown to become a major player in the sale of new and used cars.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At QuebeCar, we are committed to providing quality vehicles, whether new or used, at competitive prices. Our goal is to make buying a car as simple and enjoyable as possible for all Quebecers.

values.title: Our Values
values.quality: Quality and reliability of our vehicles

newCars.title: New Car Sales
newCars.content: Discover our wide range of new vehicles from the best brands.

usedCars.title: Certified Used Cars
usedCars.content: Carefully inspected and guaranteed used vehicles.

financing.title: Flexible Financing
financing.content: Financing options tailored to all budgets.

afterSales.title: After-Sales Service
afterSales.content: A team of qualified mechanics for the maintenance of your vehicle.

cta.title: Ready to find your next car?
cta.content: Visit our showroom or contact us for a personalized consultation.

contact.title: Contactez-Nous
contact.welcomeMessage: Nous sommes ici pour vous aider avec toutes vos questions ou préoccupations. N'hésitez pas à nous contacter.

politique.title: Sales Policy - Quebecar
politique.intro: At Quebecar, we are committed to providing high-quality used cars while ensuring complete transparency to our customers. Our sales policy is designed to guide you through every step of purchasing a used car.

guarantee.title: Warranty and Insurance
guarantee.content: We offer a limited warranty on all our used cars. This warranty covers manufacturing defects and necessary repairs for a specified period after purchase. Full warranty details are available at the time of purchase.

return_conditions.title: Return Conditions
return_conditions.content: At Quebecar, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are not satisfied, you may request a return within 7 days of the purchase date. Returned vehicles must be in good condition and in their original state.

purchase_process.title: Purchase Process
purchase_process.content: To buy a car from Quebecar, please visit our showroom or contact our  sales team. We will guide you through the buying process, from selecting the vehicle to finalizing the transaction.

financing.title: Financing
financing.content: We offer flexible financing options to help you acquire the car of your dreams. Contact our finance department to discuss the different financing options available.

politique.cta: For more information or to schedule a visit, contact us today!
